screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .rnqs file in Universal Pokemon Randomizer 1.10
screenshot.caption: RNQS file open in Universal Pokemon Randomizer 1.10

description: Fans of Pokemon who want to play old games on their computers can extract game data from console cartridges and save them in file formats, such as .GB , .GBA , .SGB , and .NDS , to use them with emulators on their computers. The Universal Pokemon Randomizer is a free tool for Windows that allows gamers to customize the settings of a Pokemon game to enhance their gameplay.

Universal Pokemon Randomizer comes packaged with various RNQS files that store settings for different types of gameplay. You can find them in the "Settings" folder included with the game installation. This is also the default location for saving RNQS files.
